body.name: ENOKING 15 Slots Universal Knife Block, Acacia Wood Knife Block without Knives, Knife Holder for Kitchen Counter- Wider Angled Openings for Keeping Knives Sharp
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 59 mins
FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 15 Universal Slots and Suitable Size- This ENOKING Universal Knife Block can hold up to 15 Knives, include a special slot for scissors or a sharpening rod. It is only 8 inches height, suitable for most cabinets of the kitchen than larger knife holder.

Max 8.2 inches Deep- Small Size, Large Capacity: This ENOKING knife block is advised for: 7.5 inch Chef knife; 7 inch Santoku knife; 7.5 inch Bread knife; 7.5 inch Slicing knife; 5 inch Utility knife; 3 inch Paring knife; 7.5 inch Kitchen shears; 7.5 inch Sharpening Rod; 6*4.7 inch Serrated steak knives.
Wider Angled Openings- The horizontal slots of The ENOKING Knife Holder can put less wear on the blades and are angled with a wider opening for easier take and put.

Beautiful Natural Acacia Wood- We select high quality Acacia wood to make it more durable and beautiful. Also, wooden knife storage prevents knives from getting dull, as they prevent unnecessary friction with other metals.

No Installation & Non-Slip Base- This Knife Storage do not need to be installationed, you can use it after receiving. This Knife Block is installed with a non-slip base that prevent it from dangerously sliding around on your kitchen counter.

Hand Wash & Easy to Clean- The knife holder is made of high quality natural wood and the surface is specially treated with natural mineral oil. If you need to clean, just use a clean cloth to wipe it.

24 Hours＋One Year Warranty Customer Service- All of the ENOKING product's packaging are upgraded to ensure that every product is delivered to you in perfect condition. If you have any needs, please don't hesitate to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Wider Openings/Beautiful Acacia Wood ENOKING 15-Slots Acacia Wood Knife Block We select high-grade natural acacia wood, using a unique design, to produce a wooden knife block that can store knives and tools. After decades of efforts and development, ENOKING has expanded a variety of kitchen knives and knife block to meet the multi-faceted needs of the modern kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I got what I paid for.
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with this purchase. The knife holder is very well-made. Love the color and looks great in my kitchen. I did get some new CUTCO knives and have put them in it along with some previous owned steak knives, looks amazing on my counter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks good and fits all of my knives.
reviews.reviewText: This looks great and it isn’t too big for my counter. I have a lot of knives and all of them fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Wood Knife Block
reviews.reviewText: This block has beautiful wood and looks great in our kitchen. The block has plenty of slots for knives and has a slot for scissors and a knife sharpener. I highly recommend this block.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars compact and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: It holds all the knives I use and does not take up too much counter space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bigger than expected.
reviews.reviewText: Size is great! Make sure it will fit under cabinet with large knives because long handles may not clear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars She loved her gift!
reviews.reviewText: I cannot review other than as the giver... This block is designed well - it has a smooth finish and the desired steak knife slots are horizontal so no edges are dulled sliding in & out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I could not be any happier with this knife block! Holds lots of larger knives. It’s even better looking in person that in the picture! And for the price it’s a steal!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy: great value for the price
reviews.reviewText: This is a sturdy knife block and very easy on the eyes. I really enjoy seeing it in my kitchen

reviews.reviewTitle: Better than most at a much better price
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 blocks intending to gift 1. Ended up keeping both because the finish was identical and when side by side both blend together perfectly looking like 1 large knife block. Finally have room for my 7 inch cleaver, 8 inch chef, and large nakiri getting them out of the drawer and at fingertips with the rest of my knives.More than enough slots to store complete set of knives when bought as a set.Even though it has quite a few larger knife slots, it still has too many small slots. Essentially 12 steak knives or pairing knives. Wish designers would realize that a 1 inch wide blade can fit into 2 inch slot but a 2 inch wide blade cannot fit into a 1 inch slot.Ended up keeping the second block as I have many wide blades from individual purchases and was still short 2 slots to keep them all together with just 1 block. *This is a problem of my own making and does not take away from the quality of this product.* Luckily I have the counter space and 1 corner that is out of the way to store both. At least now the blocks match seamlessly and drawers are free of large knives. Guess I'll have to order another to send as a gift.This is a quality product that looks elegant on display. The name is visible, but not offensively in your face like some others. It can store large wide knives, and leaves room to expand your set if desired. The dimensions are made available to know if it is right for you. Just remember to measure ALL your blades.I definitely recommend

It fits under the counter great great and isn't an eye sore like the bin that I had the knives sitting in and no longer scared someone will cut there fingers digging for a knife!! I have mix matched brands of knives that I won't give up since they are good quality but the not having a block was driving me nuts!! This fit them great!!
We are extremely happy with our purchase. It's well made, beautiful wood and very functional and accommodates a wide variety of knifes. I highly recommend purchasing.

I have a full set of knives so the 25 slots are adequateThe acacia wood is beautiful yet bonded ;) Hope the glue holds up!The second last lower slots could also be wider to accept paring & utility knivesHINT: The block is a few inches too tall for undercounter so I movedit to towards the sinks. At $40 on sale a cool deal.Chef CAter

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice block but knife slots should be wider
reviews.reviewText: My 2 » Nakiri won’t fit. I filed it biggerProblem solved
